app.description.other: Manages mods from Modrinth and Curseforge

cmd.help.usage.long.other:
Help provides help for any command in the application.
Simply type {{.appName}} help [command] for more information.

cmd.help.usage.short.other: Get help for the any command

cmd.init.tui.game-version.invalid.other: That Minecraft version does not exist

cmd.init.tui.game-version.question.other: What exact Minecraft version are you using?

cmd.init.tui.loader.question.other: Which loader do you want to use?

cmd.init.tui.mods-folder.question.other: Where will the mods be stored?

cmd.init.tui.release-types.question.other: Which types of releases would you like to consider to download?

cmd.init.usage.game-version.other: What exact Minecraft version are you using? (eg: 1.18.2, 1.19, 1.19.1)

cmd.init.usage.loader.other:
Which loader do you want to use?
Possible options: {{.loaders}}

cmd.init.usage.mods-folder.other: Where is your mods folder? (full or relative path from {{.cwd}})

cmd.init.usage.release-types.other:
Which types of releases would you like to consider to download? (comma-separated list)
Possible options: {{.releaseTypes}}
